content: TITLE: Installing Coolify via Bash Script DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the command to download and execute the Coolify installation script. It uses curl to fetch the script from a CDN and pipes it directly to bash for execution. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://cdn.coollabs.io/coolify/install.sh | bash ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Coolify Development Environment with Spin DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Coolify development environment using Spin, which sets up necessary containers and services. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` spin up ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Stable Version of Coolify DESCRIPTION: Command to install the stable production version of Coolify using the installation script from CDN. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/RELEASE.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://cdn.coollabs.io/coolify/install.sh | bash ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Resetting Coolify Database with Fresh Migrations and Seed Data DESCRIPTION: Command to reset the Coolify database, run fresh migrations, and seed it with default data, useful for resetting the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker exec -it coolify php artisan migrate:fresh --seed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Laravel Migrations in Coolify Docker Container DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Laravel database migrations within the Coolify Docker container, ensuring the database schema is up-to-date. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker exec -it coolify php artisan migrate ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Version Update/Downgrade for Coolify DESCRIPTION: Command to update or downgrade Coolify to a specific version using the installation script. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/RELEASE.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://cdn.coollabs.io/coolify/install.sh | bash -s ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Nightly Version of Coolify DESCRIPTION: Command to install the nightly development version of Coolify for testing latest features. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/RELEASE.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://cdn.coollabs.io/coolify-nightly/install.sh | bash -s next ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Beta Version of Coolify DESCRIPTION: Command to install the beta version of Coolify for testing upcoming stable features. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/RELEASE.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://cdn.coollabs.io/coolify/install.sh | bash ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Verifying Docker and Spin Installation in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to check the installed versions of Docker and Spin, ensuring proper setup of the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker --version spin --version ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pruning Unused Docker Images DESCRIPTION: Command to remove all unused Docker images, freeing up disk space in the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker image prune -a ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Coolify Docker Containers DESCRIPTION: Command to remove all Coolify-related Docker containers, part of the process for resetting the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker rm coolify coolify-db coolify-redis coolify-realtime coolify-testing-host coolify-minio coolify-vite-1 coolify-mail ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Coolify Docker Volumes DESCRIPTION: Command to remove all Coolify-related Docker volumes, ensuring a clean slate for the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker volume rm coolify_dev_backups_data coolify_dev_postgres_data coolify_dev_redis_data coolify_dev_coolify_data coolify_dev_minio_data ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Budibase Service Template in YAML DESCRIPTION: Configuration template for deploying a Budibase service instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` compose/budibase.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Windmill Service Template in YAML DESCRIPTION: Configuration template for setting up a Windmill service with Coolify. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` compose/windmill.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Plunk Configuration Template DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration for Plunk service setup with database URL configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` plunk.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Docker Compose Pull Command in PHP DESCRIPTION: Updates the Docker Compose pull command to include the '--policy always' flag, ensuring the latest images are always pulled. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` docker compose pull --policy always ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Minio Healthcheck in YAML DESCRIPTION: Updates the healthcheck command for MinIO in a Docker Compose or service configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: YAML CODE: ``` healthcheck: test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"] interval: 30s timeout: 20s retries: 3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Appwrite Configuration Update DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration update for Appwrite including OpenSSL key variable assignment. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` appwrite.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Livewire in PHP DESCRIPTION: Enables legacy model binding in the Livewire configuration to maintain compatibility with older code. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` Livewire::setModelBindingState('legacy'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Dockerfile Environment Variable in YAML DESCRIPTION: Sets the CI environment variable to true in the Dockerfile, potentially affecting build processes or configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: YAML CODE: ``` ENV CI=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Coolify with Elevated Permissions on macOS DESCRIPTION: Command to start Coolify with sudo privileges, useful when encountering permission errors on macOS. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo spin up ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing ContainerStatusTypes Enum DESCRIPTION: Definition of an enumeration class to manage container statuses in the application. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` enum ContainerStatusTypes ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Terminal Socket Connection Management DESCRIPTION: Socket reconnection interval configuration in terminal.js client implementation. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` terminal.js ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Command Parsing for SSH Operations DESCRIPTION: Function to parse commands by line for sudo operations in terminal server implementation. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` parseCommandsByLineForSudo ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Web Crawler Access Restrictions in robots.txt DESCRIPTION: This robots.txt file instructs all web crawlers (denoted by '*') to not crawl or index any content on the site (indicated by 'Disallow: /'). SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/public/robots.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: robotstxt CODE: ``` User-agent: * Disallow: / ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Entry Format in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Standard changelog entry format showing version number, date, and categorized changes under features, bug fixes, refactoring and other sections. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [4.0.0-beta.408] - 2025-04-14 ### üöÄ Features - *(OpenApi)* Enhance OpenAPI specifications - *(subscription)* Enhance subscription management ### üêõ Bug Fixes - *(pre-commit)* Correct input redirection - *(pricing-plans)* Adjust grid class ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Version Entry Beta.396 DESCRIPTION: Documents changes in version 4.0.0-beta.396 including UI features, database improvements, and various fixes SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [4.0.0-beta.396] - 2025-02-28 ### üöÄ Features - *(ui)* Add wire:key to two-step confirmation settings - *(database)* Add index to scheduled task executions for improved query performance - *(database)* Add index to scheduled database backup executions ### üêõ Bug Fixes - *(core)* Production dockerfile - *(ui)* Update storage configuration guidance link - *(ui)* Set default SMTP encryption to starttls - *(notifications)* Correct environment URL path in application notifications - *(config)* Update default PostgreSQL host to coolify-db instead of postgres - *(docker)* Improve Docker compose file validation process - *(ui)* Restrict service retrieval to current team - *(core)* Only validate custom compose files - *(mail)* Set default mailer to array when not specified - *(ui)* Correct redirect routes after task deletion - *(core)* Adding a new server should not try to make the default docker network - *(core)* Clean up unnecessary files during application image build - *(core)* Improve label generation and merging for applications and services ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Version Entry Beta.397 DESCRIPTION: Documents changes in version 4.0.0-beta.397 including billing fixes and helper updates SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [4.0.0-beta.397] - 2025-02-28 ### üêõ Bug Fixes - *(billing)* Handle 'past_due' subscription status in Stripe processing - *(revert)* Label parsing - *(helpers)* Initialize command variable in parseCommandFromMagicEnvVariable ### üìö Documentation - Update changelog ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Version Entry Beta.398 DESCRIPTION: Documents changes in version 4.0.0-beta.398 including billing features and bug fixes SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [4.0.0-beta.398] - 2025-03-01 ### üöÄ Features - *(billing)* Add Stripe past due subscription status tracking - *(ui)* Add past due subscription warning banner ### üêõ Bug Fixes - *(billing)* Restrict Stripe subscription status update to 'active' only ### üíº Other - Bump Coolify to 4.0.0-beta.398 ### üöú Refactor - *(billing)* Enhance Stripe subscription status handling and notifications ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Header Format DESCRIPTION: Standard version header format used in the changelog showing version number and release date SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [unreleased] ### üêõ Bug Fixes - *(navbar)* Update error message link - Unsend template - Replace ports with expose ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Hacker News Badge in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to embed a Hacker News badge using an HTML image tag. It links to a specific Hacker News post and displays a badge indicating that the project was featured on Hacker News. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding Product Hunt Badge in HTML DESCRIPTION: This code embeds a Product Hunt badge for the Coolify project. It uses an HTML image tag to display a 'featured' badge from Product Hunt, linking to the project's Product Hunt page. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Trendshift Badge in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet embeds a Trendshift badge for the Coolify repository. It uses an HTML image tag to display a badge from Trendshift, linking to the project's Trendshift page. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Core Maintainers Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown snippet creates a table displaying information about the core maintainers of the Coolify project. It includes their names, profile pictures, and social media links using HTML img and a tags within the Markdown table. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` | Andras Bacsai | üèîÔ∏è Peak | |------------|------------| | | | | | | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding Repository Activity Chart in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown snippet embeds a repository activity chart from Repobeats. It uses an HTML img tag within Markdown to display an SVG image showing various statistics and activity metrics for the Coolify repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ![Alt](https://repobeats.axiom.co/api/embed/eab1c8066f9c59d0ad37b76c23ebb5ccac4278ae.svg "Repobeats analytics image") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Star History Chart in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown code embeds a star history chart for the Coolify repository. It uses an HTML img tag within Markdown to display an SVG image from the star-history.com service, showing the project's GitHub star count over time. SOURCE: https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` [![Star History Chart](https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=coollabsio/coolify&type=Date)](https://star-history.com/#coollabsio/coolify&Date) ```
